tooltip-pt-homepage:

prefs-homepage:

Text of the preference in Special:Preferences to enable the homepage tab to show when viewing one's User or User Talk page.

{{doc-growthexperiments-homepage}}

Text of the preference in Special:Preferences to make the username link in the personal tools go to the homepage instead of the user page.

{{doc-growthexperiments-homepage}}
growthexperiments-homepage-email-confirm:

($1)+ is used to display a count that exceeds the configured limit, where $1 is the formatted limit number (e.g., '1,000+' or '10,000+').

Accessible text for the thanks received informational icon.

{{doc-growthexperiments-homepage}}

Third person informational text for the thanks received count in the user impact summary panel. It explains how editors may thank the user edits.

Parameters:

{{doc-growthexperiments-homepage}}

Third person informational text for the longest streak count in the user impact summary panel. It explains the streak is calculated counting days in a row the user has made edits.

Parameters:
* $1 - maximum numbers of edits considered for this value

{{doc-growthexperiments-homepage}}

Accessible text for the streak informational icon.

{{doc-growthexperiments-homepage}}

Informational text for the longest streak (consecutive days on which the user made edits) showing the number of days and the bounding dates for the streak.
* $2 - Number of days the user edited in a row. 
* $3 - Bounding dates for the longest streak of edits. The format depends on the dates: the year is shown if different from the current year, and dates are "deduplicated" whenever possible (e.g. Feb 23 - Jun 12 but Feb 23 - 25).

{{msg-mw|growthexperiments-homepage-impact-scores-best-streak-info-data-text-single-day}} is used when the streak is one day long.

{{doc-growthexperiments-homepage}}

Third person informational text for the longest streak (consecutive days on which the user made edits) showing the number of days and the bounding dates for the streak.
* $1 - Number of days the user edited in a row. 
* $2 - Bounding dates for the longest streak of edits. The format depends on the dates: the year is shown if different from the current year, and dates are "deduplicated" whenever possible (e.g. Feb 23 - Jun 12 but Feb 23 - 25).

{{msg-mw|growthexperiments-homepage-impact-scores-best-streak-info-data-text-single-day}} is used when the streak is one day long.

Error message when the on-wiki topic configuration page has bad structure (something that should be an object isn't).

Error message when a field for MediaWiki:NewcomerTasks.json should be an integer, but it isn't. Parameters: 
* $1 Task type ID.
* $2 the field name

Error message when an integer field for MediaWiki:NewcomerTasks.json is too small. Parameters: 
* $1 Task type ID.
* $2 the field name
* $3 minimum allowed value

Error message when a field for MediaWiki:NewcomerTasks.json should be an array, but it isn't. Parameters: 
* $1 Task type ID.
* $2 the field name

Error message when an array in MediaWiki:NewcomerTasks.json has too many elements. Parameters: 
* $1 Task type ID.
* $2 the field name
* $3 maximum allowed number

Error message when the on-wiki topic configuration page has an invalid ID (top-level key). Parameters:
* $1 - the ID.

Error message when the on-wiki task configuration page has an invalid 'type' parameter. Parameters:
* $1 - Value of the invalid parameter.
* $2 - Task type which has the error.
* $3 - List of valid types.

Error message when the on-wiki task configuration page has an invalid group (difficulty) specification. Parameters:
* $1 - The invalid group
* $2 - Task type which has the error.

Error message when the on-wiki task configuration page has an invalid template specification. Parameters:
* $1 - The invalid title
* $2 - Task type which has the error.

Error message when the on-wiki task configuration page has an invalid category specification. Parameters:
* $1 - The invalid title
* $2 - Task type which has the error.

Error message when the required system messages do not exist for one of the configured fields. Parameters:
* $1 - The missing message
* $2 - Task type which has the error.

Copyright message shown in the image suggestion task's save dialog, shown instead of {{msg-mw|copyrightwarning}} (on desktop) and {{msg-mw|mobile-frontend-editor-licensing-with-terms}} (on mobile).

{{doc-growthexperiments-imagesuggestions}}
growthexperiments-addimage-reason-wikipe:
Text shown in the dialog displayed when an image suggestion is selected, indicating that the image is suggested because it's used in the same article in other Wikipedias. Parameters:
* $1 - The number of projects in which the image is found. Can be used with PLURAL.
* $2 - The list of languages in which the image is found.

{{doc-growthexperiments-imagesuggestions}}
growthexperiments-addimage-reason-wikida:
Text shown in the dialog displayed when an image suggestion is selected, indicating that the image is suggested because it's used in the corresponding section in the same article in other Wikipedias. Parameters:
* $1 - The number of projects in which the image is found. Can be used with PLURAL.
* $2 - The list of languages in which the image is found.

{{doc-growthexperiments-imagesuggestions}}

Text shown in the dialog displayed when an image suggestion is selected, indicating that the image is suggested because it's both used in the corresponding section in the same article in another Wikipedia and associated with a Wikidata item that a machine recommended for the article section. Parameters:
* $1 - Name of one project in which the image is found.
* $2 - The number of other languages in which the image is found. Can be used with PLURAL.

{{doc-growthexperiments-imagesuggestions}}

Text shown in the dialog displayed when an image suggestion is selected, indicating that the image is suggested because it's the image for the article's Wikidata item.

{{doc-growthexperiments-imagesuggestions}}
growthexperiments-addimage-reason-common:
Text shown in the dialog displayed when an image suggestion is selected, indicating that the image is suggested because it's in the same category as the article.

{{doc-growthexperiments-imagesuggestions}}
growthexperiments-addimage-reason-wikida:
Text shown in the dialog displayed when an image suggestion is selected, indicating that the image is suggested because it's associated with a Wikidata item that a machine recommended for the article section.

{{doc-growthexperiments-imagesuggestions}}

growthexperiments-homepage-community-upd: Header title text for the community updates module
growthexperiments-homepage-communityupda: Text for the call to action button of the community updates module when there is no value set in the configuration
growthexperiments-addalink-milestone-not:
Header text shown when a newcomer reaches the configured edit threshold for add-a-link tasks. This notification congratulates users and informs them that add-a-link tasks are no longer available. Parameters:
* $1 - The edit threshold number (e.g., 50)
* $2 - User object for gender
* $3 - Number of recent views the user's edited articles received.
